snippet: Until 1973, Mr. Thompson wasn’t known outside of North Carolina. But later, he played at Carnegie Hall and was awarded a National Heritage Fellowship.
abstract: Joe Thompson, fiddler who nurtured the black string band, a musical tradition that predates the blues, dies at age 93.
lead_paragraph: Until 1973, Mr. Thompson wasn’t known outside of North Carolina. But later, he played at Carnegie Hall and was awarded a National Heritage Fellowship.

headline.seo: Joe Thompson Dies at 93; Fiddler of String Band Legacy
headline.main: Joe Thompson Dies at 93; Helped Preserve the Black String Band
headline.print_headline: Joe Thompson Dies at 93; Nurtured Black String Band
